name: Bundesverband Breitbandkommunikation e.V.
membership:
European Competitive Telecommuniations Association (ECTA)
European Local Fibre Alliance (ELFA)
goal: BREKO represents the majority of all alternative fixed line broadband network operators in Germany. Our more than 280 members, including more than 160 city and regional carriers as well as municipal utilities, provide urban as well as rural areas, the so-called "white spots", with high-performance fibre access. To this end, they invest more than EUR 1.5 billion every year. BREKO companies thus make a major contribution to the comprehensive fibre deployment in Germany as well as to the achievement of the German Federal Government’s broadband targets.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
